Package me.dessie.dessielib.resourcepack

Class ResourcePackBuilder

java.lang.Object
me.dessie.dessielib.resourcepack.ResourcePackBuilder
public class ResourcePackBuilder extends Object
Builder class that is used to generate a ResourcePack

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ResourcePackBuilder()
    Creates a default ResourcePackBuilder instance.

    • getAssets

      public List<Asset> getAssets()
      Returns:
      All Assets contained within this ResourcePack

    • getAssetsOf

      public <T extends Asset> List<T> getAssetsOf(Class<T> type)
      Type Parameters:
      T - The class type of asset to get.
      Parameters:
      type - The Type of Asset to get
      Returns:
      All Asset instances of a specific type that are contained within this ResourcePack.

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Returns the resource pack description
      Returns:
      The description

    • getNamespace

      public String getNamespace()
      Returns the namespace key of this resourcepack. This is usually your plugin's name.
      Returns:
      The namespace key

    • getIcon

      public File getIcon()
      Returns the icon file for this resource pack
      Returns:
      The icon file

    • getResourcePackServer

      public ResourcePackServer getResourcePackServer()
      Returns the created ResourcePackServer for this resource pack. If a resource pack server has not been created, this will return null.
      Returns:
      The ResourcePackServer instance
      See Also:
      • createWebhost(String, int)

    • isAutoUpdateHash

      public boolean isAutoUpdateHash()
      Returns if this resource pack will automatically update if it's changed.
      Returns:
      If the hash is updated.

    • getHash

      public String getHash()
      Returns the current resource pack file as a SHA1 hash in HEX.
      Returns:
      The SHA1 hash in HEX

    • getHashBytes

      public byte[] getHashBytes()
      Returns the current resource pack file as a SHA1 hash as a byte array.
      Returns:
      The SHA1 hash as bytes

    • setAutoUpdateHash

      public ResourcePackBuilder setAutoUpdateHash(boolean autoUpdateHash)
      Sets whether the Resource Pack hash should automatically change if a change in the Resource Pack is detected. This means that the client will re-download the resource pack, instead of using the cached version. It is highly recommended that this is kept enabled, which it is by default.
      Parameters:
      autoUpdateHash - Whether to update the hash.
      Returns:
      The ResourcePackBuilder instance

    • setIcon

      public ResourcePackBuilder setIcon(File icon)
      Sets the pack's in-game icon
      Parameters:
      icon - The icon png
      Returns:
      The ResourcePackBuilder instance

    • setDisplayName

      public ResourcePackBuilder setDisplayName(String displayName)
      Sets the Resource Pack's Display name. If this is not set, Minecraft uses the default "World Specific Resources".
      Parameters:
      displayName - The name to set as.
      Returns:
      The ResourcePackBuilder instance

    • setDescription

      public ResourcePackBuilder setDescription(String description)
      Sets the pack's in-game description
      Parameters:
      description - The description
      Returns:
      The ResourcePackBuilder instance

    • addAsset

      public ResourcePackBuilder addAsset(Asset asset)
      Adds an asset to this builder to generate files within the Resource Pack.
      Parameters:
      asset - The Asset to add
      Returns:
      The ResourcePackBuilder instance

    • addAssets

      public ResourcePackBuilder addAssets(Asset... assets)
      Adds many assets to this builder to generate files within the Resource Pack.
      Parameters:
      assets - The Assets to add
      Returns:
      The ResourcePackBuilder instance

    • build

      public ResourcePack build()
      Builds the ResourcePack. This will generate the .zip for players to immediately equip and start using.
      Returns:
      The ResourcePack object

    • createWebhost

      public ResourcePackBuilder createWebhost(String address, int port)
      Hosts the ResourcePack on a local web server for this machine. If this is created, this resource pack will be sent to all Players as a Server Resource pack.
      Parameters:
      address - The address for the web server.
      port - The port for the web server.
      Returns:
      The ResourcePackBuilder instance

    • createWebhost

      public ResourcePackBuilder createWebhost(String address, int port, boolean required)
      Hosts the ResourcePack on a local web server for this machine. If this is created, this resource pack will be sent to all Players as a Server Resource pack.
      Parameters:
      address - The address for the web server.
      port - The port for the web server.
      required - If the ResourcePack is required to be applied. If this is true, and a Player declines the ResourcePack, they will be kicked.
      Returns:
      The ResourcePackBuilder instance
